{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = WebSTAR DPR2320.jpg |image1_size = 75px |caption = Wireless Cable Modem Gateway |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Scientific_Atlanta_WebSTAR_DPR2320_v2_(%3F) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Incompatible |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = Incompatible |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Scientific Atlanta |model = DPR2320 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v2 <??> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = 4013371 |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point, cable modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQDPR2320,MSQWL-120GV2 |icid = 3568A-DPR2320 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM3349;QAMLink, BCM3349KPBG, CK0601 P10, 767154 NC; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS32 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- 200 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;TE28F640J3A-120; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4S281632F-UC75; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |cm_down_c = |cm_up_c = |docsisver = 2.0 |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:0A:73 |oui = 00:0A:73
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCI, USB 2.0 (slave) |exp_minipci_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = yes,, 8-pin header
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DOCSIS 2.0 |addchip = Direct Conversion Cable Tuner;Broadcom;BCM3419;BROADCOM, BCM3419KML, cP0550 P10, P1X82 02;1; |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = WebSTAR |defaultssid_regex = ^WebSTAR$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = ASUS |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/30/2006 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B008C4I2OM |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = ASUS WL-120g v2 |rad1modif = Mini PCI |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4318;BCM4318KFBG, HD0611 P11, 775709 B5A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "DPR2320", "REV: 1.00A", and "PCB MADE IN CHINA" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Default settings are per the FCC manual. :The FCC manual screenshots show a 00:0A:73 OUI in use - it's presumed to be used.. :The SSID is shown as '''WebSTAR'''. Again, it's presumed to be used.
==Links of Interest== *[[Cisco]] DPR2320 - [https://www.cnet.com/products/cisco-model-dpr2320-cable-modem-gateway-with-802-11g-wireless-access-point-wireless-router-cable-mdm-802-11b-g-desktop/ Spec.]
==Notes== ===Probable used PSU=== The power supply shown in the FCC photos is a '''Leader Electronics''' T48120RO3CT.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Leader Electronics |model = T48120RO3CT |countrymanuf = China |input_v=120 |input_a=0.21 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=1 |output_conn=barrel |style=corded, brick }}
==See also== *[[Askey DPR2320]] - WebSTAR Cable Resident Gateway :FCC ID H8N-DPR2320 (CHE106W-D17)
